charges.charge_description: NARCOTICS - POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 169 months. Upon release from imprisonment, defendant shall be placed on supervised release for 10 years. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $100, which is due immediately. All fines and costs are waived.
